entries.message: We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Singapore locations. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Our Network Engineers have identified an inbound attack that required manual intervention in order to mitigate.  We are still investigating this issue further but have taken steps to restore connectivity at this time and access to your Vultr services should be normalizing.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Singapore location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.

Our engineering team will be performing upgrades to infrastructure in our Dallas location. During this maintenance window, the following functions will not be available:

• VPS instance consoles from the Vultr dashboard
• Bare Metal deployment and power control

Previously deployed servers in Dallas will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Our engineering team will be performing upgrades to infrastructure in our Seattle locationsss. During this maintenance window, the following functions will not be available:

• VPS instance consoles from the Vultr dashboard
• Bare Metal deployment and power control

Previously deployed servers in Seattle will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
